posts.post_content:
Have this Matty PSA 3.5 available for $SOLD obo. Really a nice example and not seeing many PSA “higher” graded ones of late.

Will consider trades for T206’s in comparable value. Just shoot me a PM or leave a comment. Anyone saying “I’ll take it” gets priority over ongoing negotiations.
